name: Hazem Hiary
content: Dr. Hazem Kaylani | German Jordanian University Skip to main content ﻿ Dr. Hazem Kaylani < Back to School Dr. Hazem Kaylani Associate Professor OFFICE: C134 PHONE: +962 6 4294444 Ext. 4505 Email ResearchGate LinkedIn Resume Google Scholar Biography Dr. Hazem Kaylani joined The German-Jordanian University (GJU) in 2006.  He received his Ph.D. in industrial engineering from Arizona State University. Prior to that he worked as a senior simulation analyst at the Boeing Company, Mesa, Arizona. His research interests include Optimization of stochastic models, discrete event simulation tools, and hybrid production control systems Educational Background Industrial Engineering (Operations Research), Arizona State University Mechanical Engineering,University of Jordan Industrial Engineering, University of Jordan Research Interests Optimization of Stochastic Models Discrete Event Simulation Tools for Manufacturing Hybrid Production Control Systems Quality Assurance in Global Supply Chains Experience خبراته السابقة تشمل العمل في شركة بوينغ للطائرات في الولايات المتحدة، لمدة 8 سنوات. بالإضافة الى ذلك، عمل في عدة مشاريع ممولة من السوق الأوروبية بقيمة 2.5 مليون يورو، تتعلق بالجودة الكاملة لبرامج الدراسات العليا وتطوير الخطط الدراسية، بالإضافة الى مواضيع بحثية أخرى. العمل الاكاديمي لمدة 15 سنة.
